function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Public health interventions may not be sufficient to stop disease outbreaks in modern society, according to mathematical models.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Airborne pathogens from sick person, building, or intentional release","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limitations of dilution method","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limitations of filtration method","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Filter surface adhesion of particles reducing enzyme filter performance","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Variable susceptibility of pathogens to uvgi based on cell wall presence and thickness","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of relative humidity on uvgi efficiency","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate room air mixing and uneven distribution of uv radiation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High room relative humidity above 75%","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uvgi system at higher air stream velocities","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Accumulation of ’dead’ pathogens on contact surface reducing effectiveness of pco method","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Formation of secondary chemical species reducing indoor air quality","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain impact on human health and air quality of plasmacluster ions technology pci .","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible misuse of essential oils in ventilation industry without proper evaluation.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hypersensitivity reaction of occupants to essential oils","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Toxicity of essential oils to human and microbial cells","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative effects of silver nanoparticles on health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient data on minimum ventilation requirement for public premises","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for airborne cross-infection due to low air velocity and disturbance of boundary layer around individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elevated levels of resuspended particles in the room and within the convection flow","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resuspended particles brought into the breathing zone of the occupants","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resuspended particles of respiratory origin calculated for specific settling velocities and dry density of nonvolatile species in saliva","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of inlet and outlet positions on particle deposition and airflow velocity","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Comparison of ventilation supply systems in a hospital environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Downward ventilation may not always protect people from cross-infection due to mixing ventilation and free convection around the human body.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Displacement ventilation performs worse when patients are lying sideways, leading to the persistence of exhalation jets over a long distance.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing the throw of the supply jet from the floor diffuser can deteriorate inhaled air quality and promote resuspension of particles including those carrying respiratory pathogens.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of influenza transmission in a built environment with different ventilation systems mixing, underfloor, personalized","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of cross-infection due to unprotected occupants in rooms with personalized ventilation and other ventilation systems","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependence of air supply diffuser performance on user position, angle, clothing insulation, and ambient air temperature.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Draught felt by people at high air flow rates from personalized air supply nozzles.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low velocity personalized ventilation system may not effectively mitigate the propagation of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incomplete knowledge on pathogen transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of covid-19 globally","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of sars-cov-2 through respiratory system","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncertain origin of sars-cov-2","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Viral infections caused by coronaviruses continue to emerge and pose a severe public health problem.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly contagious nature and relatively long incubation period of sars-cov-2 can lead to silent carriers and high basic reproductive number for covid-19 virus.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Susceptibility of sars-cov-2 to heat and ultraviolet uv light may affect virus transmission under certain conditions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of specific treatment or vaccine for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Asymptomatic transmission of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Higher risk of severe illness for older adults and those with existing medical conditions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Human-to-human transmission of covid-19 through respiratory droplets","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of covid-19 via unsymptomatic individuals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of preventive measures for covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Large-scale research and development efforts for vaccines and treatments","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate clinical understanding of covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Studying patients with covid-19, including those with a direct link to the epicenter, poses a risk of exposure to the virus for the researchers.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reviewing a small subset of literature on covid-19 may lead to incomplete understanding of the disease and its characteristics.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive review of the covid-19 outbreak and its potential implications","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
